options.text: I'm feeling anxious and worried most of the time.
I'm struggling with sadness, hopelessness, and low energy.
I've experienced something traumatic and can't seem to move past it.
I struggle to feel good about myself and my abilities.
I'm having a hard time coping with the loss of someone or something important.
I feel stressed-out and unable to cope with my current situation.
I'm struggling with issues related to my identity or sense of self.
I'm going through a big change or transition and need support.
